turn.2: Alopecia (album) Alopecia is the second studio album by American band Why?.
turn.4: It was released by Anticon on March 11, 2008.
turn.5: How was the album received by critics?
turn.6: At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average score out of 100 to reviews from mainstream critics, "Alopecia" received an average score of 76% based on 21 reviews, indicating "generally favorable reviews".
turn.7: Did the album win any awards?
turn.8: "Pitchfork" placed "Fatalist Palmistry" at number 94 on the "100 Best Tracks of 2008" list.
